subject: Olympic Games (2022)
Soccer
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The 2022 Winter Olympics will not move from its traditional February slot to make way for a rescheduled World Cup in Qatar, said the head of the world’s national Olympic committees, Sheikh Ahmad al-Fahad al-Sabah.
snippet: The 2022 Winter Olympics will not move from its traditional February slot to make way for a rescheduled World Cup in Qatar, said the head of the world’s national Olympic committees, Sheikh Ahmad al-Fahad al-Sabah.
